description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: The first book in the Harry Potter series, introducing the young wizard Harry Potter.

title: The Hobbit
description: A fantasy novel and children's book by J.R.R. Tolkien, precursor to The Lord of the Rings.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel by Harper Lee published in 1960, widely studied in schools and known for its themes of racial injustice.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel by F. Scott Fitzgerald that critiques the American Dream during the Jazz Age.
